availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Anderson County, Kentucky, farmer. Anderson County native. Son of Edmund and Alpha Watts. Married Sarah Watts. Father of Mary Watts, Martha Watts, Wesley Watts, Cerilda Watts, Susan Watts, and John Watts. Farmer in Anderson County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, Lawrenceburg post office, p. 63; Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records on Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Microfilm Roll #994027, Anderson County Deaths, 1876.
